name: Archaic
description: Only Ancillae or older vampires may choose one of these flaws.

disadvantages.name: Living in the Past
disadvantages.description: You have one or more old-fashioned beliefs such as "lower classes are for serving." For each dice supply in a social conflict situation where the belief applies and the other being is not the same age or older and thus could respect the belief, you have one less die

disadvantages.name: Archaic
disadvantages.description: You can not use modern technology

name: Bonding
description: Not all vampires react equally strongly to the blood bond. Some fall for a master or mistress with blissful ease, others resist it with all their might. The merits and flaws can be combined; for example, a character may have two points in Bond Junkie and one Short Bond.

advantages.name: Bond Resistenz
advantages.description: It is easier for you to fight against the bond. Per level in this move (max. 3) you get one more die when defending against the bond.

advantages.name: Short Bond
advantages.description: The strength of the bond wears off faster. Per month the bond loses 2 points without renewal

advantages.name: Unbondable
advantages.description: The blood bond has no effect on you

disadvantages.name: Bond Junkie
disadvantages.description: The bond feels more affectionate. You get one less die when you trade for the ribbon

disadvantages.name: Long Bond
disadvantages.description: The bond lasts longer and takes 3 months to lose a point

disadvantages.name: Bondslave
disadvantages.description: You bind yourself at the first sip of Vitae

name: Feeding
description: These merits and flaws describe your drinking habits.

advantages.name: Bloodhound
advantages.description: You can smell the resonance of the blood instead of having to taste the blood (sample: Resolve + Awareness >= 3)

advantages.name: Iron Gullet
advantages.description: You can feed on cold blood, rancid blood or fractionated plasma

disadvantages.name: Methuselah's Thirst
disadvantages.description: You can reduce your hunger only by drinking supernatural creatures, or thin blood thickened by alchemists, otherwise your hunger is always at least 1

disadvantages.name: Prey Exclusion
disadvantages.description: You refuse to hunt a certain type of prey,

disadvantages.name: Vegan
disadvantages.description: You feed only on animal blood. It costs you 2 points of willpower to drink human blood

disadvantages.name: Organovore
disadvantages.description: Your hunger can only be reduced by eating organs, especially the bloody ones, or human flesh

name: Linguistics
description: Each character can speak, read and write his native language fluently. Each additional point in this merit, allows you to speak, read and write another language.

advantages.name: Language 1
advantages.description: You can speak, read and write the named language.

advantages.name: Language 2
advantages.description: You can speak, read and write the named language.

advantages.name: Language 3
advantages.description: You can speak, read and write the named language.

advantages.name: Language 4
advantages.description: You can speak, read and write the named language.

advantages.name: Language 5
advantages.description: You can speak, read and write the named language.

disadvantages.name: Illiterate
disadvantages.description: You can't read and write languages.

name: Looks
description: The merits and flaws relate to the appearance of the vampire and have an impact on the social environment

advantages.name: Beautiful
advantages.description: For all matching social dice supplies, you have a bonus of 1

advantages.name: Stunning
advantages.description: For all matching social dice supplies, you have a bonus of 2

disadvantages.name: Ugly
disadvantages.description: For all matching social dice supplies, you have a penalty of 1

disadvantages.name: Repulsive
disadvantages.description: For all matching social dice supplies, you have a penalty of 2

name: Mythic Merits and Flaws
description: These merits and flaws relate to magical curses, peculiarities of blood and other mystical effects.

advantages.name: Eat Food
advantages.description: You can gain weight and enjoy food, but it does not nourish you and must be eliminated before resting

disadvantages.name: Folkloric Bane
disadvantages.description: You take heavy damage from a folkloric curse such as "ultraviolet light" or "holy water".

disadvantages.name: Folkloric Block
disadvantages.description: In front of such a blockade you must retreat or use one point of willpower to break the blockade. Blockades are e.g. "sacred symbol" or "crossing the threshold of a house without invitation of the owner".

disadvantages.name: Stigmata
disadvantages.description: When you reach hunger 4, you bleed from open wounds and can leave your mark and attract attention

disadvantages.name: Stake Bait
disadvantages.description: Should a stake pierce your heart, you die for good instead of falling into rigidity

name: Psychological
description: These merits and demerits refer to psychological peculiarities of the character.

disadvantages.name: Life on a Knife Edge
disadvantages.description: You suffer from the compulsion to always have new experiences. This compulsion likes to force you to perform suicidal and partly unpredictable actions as well

disadvantages.name: Weak Will
disadvantages.description: Your will is weak and you have trouble asserting your own personality when confronted with someone else's will. Even if you know someone wants to influence you mentally or emotionally (through domination, for example), you must not resist.

name: Substance Use
description: You are not only addicted to blood, but also to another substance that usually punishes you if you don't have access to it.

advantages.name: High-Functioning Addict
advantages.description: You get a bonus of 1 to all dice supplies if the last person you drank from had your drug intact

disadvantages.name: Addiction
disadvantages.description: You receive a penalty of 1 to all dice supplies (except those that favor your drug use), unless the last person you drank from had your drug in them

disadvantages.name: Hopeless Addiction
disadvantages.description: You receive a penalty of 2 to all dice supplies (except those that favor your drug use), unless the last person you drank from had your drug in them
